content.rendered:
This exclusive event brought together Handshake’s HBCU partners to learn from, discuss, and share success stories and best practices for maximizing student engagement with career services offices.

This is a recording of the fireside chat with Dr. Tiffanie Turner-Henderson, Interim Assistant Director of Career Readiness at Johnson C. Smith University, to discuss how JCSU has successfully built engagement with student leadership and organizations such as Greek life, Royal Court, and ambassador groups.

Followup Materials:

  • Handshake Social Media Playbook: A brand new guide offering tips on how to boost engagement with students across every social media platform.
  • Case Study: Southern University Embeds Handshake Into the Institutional Experience: SUBR shares their goals and successes in making Handshake a mandatory component of the student experience.
View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: A gathering of Handshake’s HBCU partners to discuss and share best practices for growing student engagement
